website_summaries.verdict: The LG Tone Infinim Bluetooth earphones offer solid sound quality, but they're a bit light on bass for the price.

customer_reviews.title: The headset was great until it broke just 3 months later
customer_reviews.text: The headset was great until it broke just 3 months later. The worst part is LG's customer service. Just try and get it repaired following their instructions -- they make it impossible and even sent it back to me saying insufficient proof of purchase (my receipt from Amazon Prime). Very dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CRB914

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in Feb. had a few issues similar to those reported below where it would cut off and would have to turn on and off, but it wasn't often. My BIG DISAPPOINTMENT is I purchased them in Feb. and less than 5 months they no longer work. I reached out to the company Cell Emporium and they said there is only a 90 day warranty. I've had 3 other LG headsets and they lasted minimum of two years, In fact I had to revert back to my old one that is about 3 years old. I would beware of this company as I have to believe these must be refurbished to only last 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Bales

customer_reviews.title: good headphones, no bass, HBS-910 is better
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones overall, but no bass. they have these bass knobs on the ear buds to adjust the bass levels, but they do just as much for the bass as turning your socks inside out will. absolutely no noticeable difference in the sound. they also disconnect frequently which ive never experienced with an LG product, so thats really annoying. Other than that they're great headphones. i recommend the HBS-910 instead, theyre better in every way except that the 910 is Bluetooth 4.1 and the 920 is 4.2
customer_reviews.author: Tobacco Town LLC

customer_reviews.title: Microphone placement is stupid (it sits at the side of the user's neck
customer_reviews.text: This junk is going back. Microphone placement is stupid (it sits at the side of the user's neck, so you are frequently repeating yourself in conversations, because the mic doesn't pick up your voice at all due to placement). Audio quality for music is acceptable. There are many equivalent options for much less money. Do not purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A Shaw

customer_reviews.title: LG headsets are not working up to the name.
customer_reviews.text: This headset is no better than the cheaper versions. It quit working about 2 months after I got it or just before they return date expired. The return policy is very complicated I still have the product and unable to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bacote

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: The reason for this purchase was that I had a set before and appreciated it so much, I can't visualize ever finding anything as good. This was a replacement buy. Sound quality is bad, causing people to tell me they can't hear me and making other complaints about the sound. Are these items being sold from the "defect" pile? Because this is a defective set.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: A bit bulky for smaller people, but work great!!
customer_reviews.text: These work great, although I think they are a little better as far a size for a man. I am 5'4 110 pounds and they are a bit bulky for my neck. I am still using them as they work and sound great, but I had the older LG model and it was more flexible and not quite as bulky. I had to replace them as the right ear sound went out. Overall these are great, unless you are a smaller person.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Rubin

customer_reviews.title: AVOID LG PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: LG is a joke, this product stopped working after 6 months (read other reviews, this is common). Returned to LG but they will not honor the manufacturer warranty because they are not accepting invoices/ receipts from Amazon as proof of purchase. I sent LG every thing I could get from Amazons own customer service for the purchase of the headset, still not acceptable to LG, bad product made worse by awful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Boyd

customer_reviews.title: It's horrible do not buy sound quality and background noise is not like the other LG headphones
customer_reviews.text: It's the most horrible LG headphones ever I have been using LG for a very long time the sound quality and the background noise cancelation does not work at all in these headphones the other person can bearly hear me I have to literally put my mouth on to the headphones so they can hear me not recommending this model at all
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.....
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very comfortable. But many people complain that I am either muffled or I sound like I am 20 feet away. There is also a lot of background noise interference for the people I am talking to. Contacted LG. Heard back from them once but then didn't respond any further.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Longevity
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not made like some of the older models. I bought these in August 2019, and they have already stopped working. The power button doesn’t work anymore. The speaker wire has slowly pulled away from the left speaker. I don’t know if these were genuine or not. I usually get about 14-18 months out of these in the past. I use them on a daily basis for work, about 10-12 hours a day. When they were operating properly they had perfect clarity, great sound, decent distance, and connected easily.
customer_reviews.author: Vlasios Kantartzis

customer_reviews.title: Ear canals much be large enough to stick thumbs in.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really know about the sound because the ear tips are so large, I would be able to stick my thumbs in my canal to be that large. The tips are huge! It looks really nice, but..... I need something I don’t need to hold to my ears. May as we’ll hold the phone as the ear piece.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaT

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the older version. The buds do not retract as well. The connection to the phone is not as clear. Older version seems more solidly made
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this, battery last forever, only have to charge once a week, Easy to use, app that you use with it makes it so much easier, as well. The Sound is Superb. I have numerous Wireless headsets and this definitely gets my top vote
customer_reviews.author: Ganurse1976

customer_reviews.title: Long Battery life and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I loved the previous version HSB900. The only thing I would like to have had on these is the play/pause button and the answer/end call button to be on the top rather than the sides. They are quite a bit smaller than on the previous model as well. I find myself accidentally hitting one of the buttons while I have my hands over my head while I am working. Overall they are great and last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Blosser

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND
customer_reviews.text: My husband's second pair. I got this pair through warehouse deal which made it an even better buy. saved a ton. perfect sound, not too much or too little. Just right!!
customer_reviews.author: Street

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, Wish it was more comfortable and switches more durable.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Wish it was more flexible to make more comfortable. Retractable earbuds much more robust than I thought. In the end what broke was the on/off switch after less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: onederSF

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 8-9 months before failing
customer_reviews.text: After 8-9 months the battery suddenly stopped charging and I was not able to turn the unit on. I sent it back for servicing, they returned it without fixing, they attributed it to mishandling or abuse. The headset still looks like new - I'm not sure what I may have done other than sweat a lot at the gym. In any case it worked fine up until that time, no complaints about the design.
customer_reviews.author: Luz Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Product is not the same advertised, they specify that it has adjustable base quality on earbuds, it does not. Scammed. Delivery method is so bad that it shows for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Zephirot69

customer_reviews.title: Great product other than connection at a distance
customer_reviews.text: It's light, you do not notice it on. I love the retractable ear buds. It connects too phone quickly. Only negative don't too to far from phone, so it's hard if you don't pockets and your walking around. I like cleaning my house with it so it's hard in that aspect of you right have pockets it looses connection. I have a small house so going even from Room too room it cuts off. Suggest always having phone on you.
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: Button failure
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very good, but after less than six months the buttons have completely failed. The only one that works is the power toggle.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Eff

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality when making a phone call is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality when making a phone call is terrible . Who is talking to you , they can’t hear you ,the sound look like from the hell .
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a birthday present for my husband to replace an old LG headset that was wearing out after almost 10 years of use. He loves them! Sound quality is great and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heads above good
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about these head phones!! My ears are so sensitive and this product is fabulous!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have really liked that I can multitask and have both hands free while talking on the phone. Plus not have my neck kinked by holding my phone between head and shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Noorda

customer_reviews.title: Really like them but this one was a dud
customer_reviews.text: This unit would connect properly but then would constantly say it wasn't connected & trying to connect again. One minute later same thing. I have been using the LG HBS 900 product for about 3 years now. Really like them but this one was a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small for a big neck
customer_reviews.text: Mic is near neck sometimes my voice is muffled to other person.
customer_reviews.author: Boat4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the LG Tone Bluetooth headset, I have a bad neck and it’s uncomfortable to hold my phone to my ear. These are prefect. I have bought many of these for myself and gifts for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Lost my other pair. Bought a second. Best for underneath a helmet. I wear these while riding & i have to turn them down quite a bit so i can hear my own bike. Very noise cancelling. The only earbuds I’ll buy from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headphone. I'm really happy. Sound quality is excellent, both listening and week used to talk one they phone. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I disappointed in the product quality
customer_reviews.text: So far, people are having a very hard time hearing me. I disappointed in the product quality. I will keep messing with it to see if I can fix the issue, but so far, it's not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphone- better than the trash iphone ear pods
customer_reviews.text: Every thing about this is good. I have bought this one years ago.. using it everyday.. it last for 3 years until the sound now is weak. Time to get a new one for another 3 happy years with it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Soliman

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced piece of junk..
customer_reviews.text: After three months this started failing what a disappointment no wonder the reviews are so negative. Do not get this product for the price you can get three of a generic brand that will work same or better.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of not holding a phone while in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of not holding a phone while in use. This device do not allow you to be heard clearly. Most time I'm told "I cant hear you" or "It sound like you're in water"while on a call. I would like to send back for a new pair. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. May get another pair for standby in case these break.
customer_reviews.author: Capthook58

customer_reviews.title: Love amazon just not this prod6
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality this is the 3rd one I purchase I will not re purchase the item. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: lena galan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and no one can tell I am "blue toothed"
customer_reviews.author: Robin A Lee

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound and very comfortable to wear. Blocks out external noise pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: NGAConny

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. I work as a heavy equipment mechanic and these get abused, lasted almost a year. Away to buy another pair
customer_reviews.author: martin burns

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 months and then 1 ear stopped, 3 months later the other ear stopped, not worth the money it's a piece of garbage thank the lord it's no longer available
customer_reviews.author: Ezra Tabak

customer_reviews.title: Headset broke after only 8 months of use!
customer_reviews.text: Headset broke only after 8 months of use. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Ali

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better unit. This will be returned or replaced.
customer_reviews.text: Neck band is small and causes the mic to become muffled. Others cannot hear me because of fit and other unknown internal issues. Retraction is beginning to fail. Sound quality is intermittent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Custo

customer_reviews.title: These headphones stopped working completely just after 30 days, ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones stopped working completely just after 30 days, I cannot find any way to get a refund on this .There were erratic right from the beginning in terms of taking a charge or lasting long after a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: Like the button to make them retract, I had the other type and they broke after a month.
customer_reviews.author: WBCoury

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid
customer_reviews.text: Good product - nice sound. Only complaint is the retractable earbuds - they don't always go all the way in.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Sybouts

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The person on the other end says the sound quality is terrible. I wonder if this is a refurbished product.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Crumpton

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I went through a couple of these kind of headsets before finding one that worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Brady

customer_reviews.title: Gym Use Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excelente product. Sounds Grade and is confortable for the gym too.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it fits
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it fits, however the person on the other end of my phone calls, always say that can not hear me well. My voice appears to be muffled.
customer_reviews.author: cmeeks

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and long lasting. Great product at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound
customer_reviews.text: A lot of complaints about sound quality. Cables for earbuds annoyingly get tangled or caught on shirt
customer_reviews.author: Juan rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good, with defects
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, but when making phone calls, Sometimes the other person can't hear me very well
customer_reviews.author: evan smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This headset left left a bad rash around my neck
customer_reviews.author: kmonique corley

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bluetooth Connection
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that after two weeks of using the headphones constantly disconnects from my phone within close range!
customer_reviews.author: Deshawn Brown

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, professional, long battery life! I wear this gadget 12 hrs a day and do t even realize it’s there half the time.
customer_reviews.author: T. New

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable clear most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: Like it well enough for the price. Have ordered it more than once.
customer_reviews.author: SHH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, but people keep on complaining that they can't hear me well.
customer_reviews.author: yitzchak ciment

customer_reviews.title: Do not turn left
customer_reviews.text: I like the head phones as long as you do not turn your head to the left.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Just wont sinc Worked well for a while and just stopped
customer_reviews.author: Milton Deputy

customer_reviews.title: Nevered worked correctly.
customer_reviews.text: People cannot hear me on it, they can barely hear me, been that way from day one. I need to return it to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: james jones

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I just love these types of bluetooths can't go wrong with LG.
customer_reviews.author: PlesiaDiva

customer_reviews.title: Believe the bad reviews.  I didn't, and now I am returning.
customer_reviews.text: Believe the bad reviews. I didn't, and now I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Signal
customer_reviews.text: Signal is very weak. I can't put my phone in my back pocket with dropping the call. If I have the phone on my right leg it breaks up. Just very bad signal
customer_reviews.author: monique

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully they make the task.
customer_reviews.text: Thus far, the product is ok. I've only had it for a week and the only downfall I've encountered is the earbuds don't retrack with just a tug on the wire. It's probably best because that action could cause damage to the wire if tugged on to hard. But, all my other lg's went south after they got wet from my sweat. and some the bluetooth went out on one earpiece. they were refurbished so I can't completely complain at least they lasted a while before going caputes. These I bought new so I'll see how they last.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jackson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable set
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one as I used my old one until the on/off switch quit working. I was a little rough on it so plan to be more gentle with this one. Love the way it feels and it stays in place whether I'm walking, or lying down. My Bose set has better sound, but is only clamped onto my clothing. As expensive as they are, I am careful about where I wear them. The LG earphones are better for most places I work, walk, or out and about with others.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Bad product. terrible company and awful service
customer_reviews.text: The headset worked ok for a few months. One day it did not charge anymore. I tried several chargers to no avail. When I talked to LG for repair since it had been way less than a year from purchase, they gave me, in summary, the run around and returned the item to me unfixed. Bad product. terrible company and awful service. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rojas

customer_reviews.title: My second pair and I love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones out there in my opinion. The battery life lasts forever it seems and the sounds quality is killer. They also noice cancel very well. I'd highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Troublesome Earphone
customer_reviews.text: The product is too big around my neck, it slides and isn't easy to turn on and off when making phone calls. The sound is only mediocre, it doesn’t get very loud. When releasing the earphones from the place of storage on the headphone, it is difficult to grasp and pull out. These earphones are not giving me a rewarding experience. I would like a different kind of earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Thomas

customer_reviews.title: stopped working in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Don't waste your money. LG refused to honor their warranty. The sound quality when listening was very good. However, for phone calls, people constantly complained that they couldn't hear me. Would have still rated these a 3 star for listening to music or podcasts, but the left side earbud has now, less than 6 months after purchase, stopped working all together.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sword

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these basically as a spare, when I charged and paired them to my phone, the sound quality was so low you could barely hear what you were listening to. The commands were not loud enough to be recognized by the head set. Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E L

customer_reviews.title: Received them sounded great BUT when you hit the side buttons to retract ...
customer_reviews.text: Received them sounded great BUT when you hit the side buttons to retract the ear buds it takes a 30 minutes for them to go back LOL. I returned them and bought an older style that retracts and had no problems with those.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E.

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: I owned an older pair of LG bluetooth headphones for many years and had great comfort. The LG HBS-920 sound great, but for some reason, they make my ears hurt. The barrel of the earpiece are somewhat larger than my previous pair.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Convenient - stylish - ROCK&ROLL!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, I love these, just press the button and they retract. Volume knobs on the ear pieces! Quality, arrived a day early as usual, totally happy with this seller & LG!
customer_reviews.author: Freedumb

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds fit on the big side
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality if I can get the buds in my ears properly, but uncomfortable because the smallest size earpiece is still too big and starts to hurt after a few minutes or they fall out if not seated properly. Using controls and mobility while wearing is great. They don’t pull as you turn your head like wired buds do
customer_reviews.author: D. Knight

customer_reviews.title: So so....
customer_reviews.text: This Bluetooth works okay but the volume isn't what it says it is, it's very difficult to hear some people with it other people are okay but for the most part everybody is difficult to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this so much i bought my wife one because she always took it from me. Excellent sound and range. Sometimes i forget i am even wearing it. The vibration is nice because i don't always hear my phone. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: WireBucket

customer_reviews.title: Great Handsfree Item
customer_reviews.text: This item is wonderful. I enjoy being able to wear it around my neck so that my "ears" are available at any time. The sound and battery life are satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for music on the go..
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a week or so, and coming from over the ear headphones, the sound is amazing and they are so light! I can work out and not have any fear of something flying off my head!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Christian Stenquist

customer_reviews.title: not the best headset I've owned
customer_reviews.text: works ok, not the best headset I've owned, cuts out and people have a hard time hearing me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a week and the right side doesn’t stay out you pull it and it goes straight back in. Terrible quality
customer_reviews.author: Totti Chiha

customer_reviews.title: She loves them
customer_reviews.text: Brought them for my girlfriend to replace a dying pair, she doesn't go anywhere without them and really likes the retracting feature.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lee

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: The headset is fine but I think it's been used before I get it. The box is teared from the corners and the charger is not tied as it should be from the factory and it's not wrapped by plastic as it should be also the additional pods missing and there is no instruction manuals which comes in every box as usual. Really, I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Abofisal

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The only thing is that the battery goes from medium to low really fast and then it shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: Titus McLongstrokes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the person who received this headset is quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with these products.
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would make these things a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, top quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Battery lasts 10 hrs +. Comfortable around neck. Clear sound on phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: LisaC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Said the product was new, but it clearly had been opened. To top it off it never worked. Even let it charge for a full 24 hours and it still wouldn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Toccara

customer_reviews.title: not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Wound up giving it to my son, does not fit around my larger neck. I ware an 18" color and it is too tight
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Very good Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item as used/like new and one ear peace does not work so well. But it's a great item and works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: useless and waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have returned it , it did not work atall, up till now I haven't heard from them doe my full refund
customer_reviews.author: Modupeola k.

customer_reviews.title: Not super impressed...
customer_reviews.text: speaker cut out with the first week and microphone was not very clear when used with bluetooth telephone calls
customer_reviews.author: S Watson

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience
customer_reviews.text: This device is the second device that I change. The first one was already changed and when I tried it, the battery problem appeared. I think it's the battery. I think is there a manufacturing problem in this model HBS-920.
customer_reviews.author: maximo

product_meta.title: LG TONE INFINIM HBS-920 Wireless Stereo Headset - Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SilverThe LG TONE INFINIM is the premium Bluetooth Wireless Headset engineered for true audiophiles. Advanced features create an audio experience targeted to achieve the highest standard of listening - from music to phone calls to multimedia and everything in between. Tone bass provides adjustable bass on the earbud, and Harman Kardon Signature Sound comes through with crystal-clear quality and rich tones. Plus, advanced voice capture solution pinpoints a caller's voice while reducing surrounding noise. A body-contoured and lightweight design help accent the premium features of the LG TONE INFINIM for a natural feel and elevated listening experience you won't find in other wireless headsets.
feature_bullets: Tone bass - enjoy adjustable bass on the earbud for the ability to turn on/off boost bass when desired. High Elastic Polymer. Damping Layer
Harmon Kardon signature sound - appreciate exceptional Audio with sound quality targeted for True music lovers.
Metal layer speaker technology - experience less distortion for clearer highs and more natural sounding Audio.

Advanced voice capture solution - capture the caller's voice while reducing unwanted ambient noise.if Cannot connect the HBS-920 to mobile phone then Simultaneously press and hold the Call button and slide the Power switch to the ON position and the HBS-920 switches to Search mode.
Body-contoured & lightweight design - feel the comfort of a contoured, lightweight design. Refer user manual for troubleshooting steps.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars306 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
